Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Gloria Steinem wrote the viral comparison of abortion and gun legislation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Gloria Steinem wrote the comparison.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Gloria Steinem wrote the viral comparison, which is incorrect.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim falsely attributes the comparison to Gloria Steinem when it was actually written by someone else.
Understate: The claim understates the impact and circulation of the viral comparison, as it has received attention for several years and continues to be shared on social media.
Falters at times: The claim falters by falsely attributing the comparison to Gloria Steinem and perpetuating the misconception.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
